channel.title: Bullet-synths on Lightning Within Five
channel.description: Recent content in Bullet-synths on Lightning Within Five

item.description: Incoherent Bullet Synthesizer (IBS) The goal of this project is to produce “real”-sounding Air Force performance bullet statements using a machine learning model. This is an interesting problem for a computer to solve, due to the fact that bullet “best practices” are almost completely arbitrary, largely depending on the whims of supervisors, superintendents, first shirts, and commanders. This project isn’t intended to be a serious tool for people to write their own bullets.
